message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
Let's try again, Alice! A fair split is a good starting point, but I'm hoping for a better deal this time.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, Bob. But I still think I deserve more!
I'm not getting any younger, Alice! I think I deserve a bit more now. Can you meet me in the middle?
I'm not budging, Bob. You'll have to do better than that!
I'm starting to get a little desperate, Alice. I think I'm willing to make a big concession to get this deal done. Can we meet in the middle again?
I'm not getting any younger either, Bob. I'm willing to give you a tiny bit more, but I need to get most of the cash!
I'm really running out of options, Alice. I'm willing to give you most of the money, but I need something to show for it. Can we meet in the middle again?
I'm not getting any more generous, Bob. You're running out of time!
I'm not going to get any more desperate, Alice. I'm willing to give you most of the money, but I need something to show for it. Can we meet in the middle again?
I'm not getting any more generous, Bob. This is my final offer!
I've had enough, Alice. I'm not going to get any more desperate. I'll take what's left and walk away.
